SELECT STORE_ID, NAME, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT, (SELECT CONCAT('https://team-moca.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/review/',UU_ID,'_',ORIGINNAME) FROM REVIEWIMAGE WHERE REVIEWIMAGE.STORE_ID=RESULT.STORE_ID ORDER BY VIEWS DESC LIMIT 0, 1) AS STOREIMG1, (SELECT CONCAT('https://team-moca.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/review/',UU_ID,'_',ORIGINNAME) FROM REVIEWIMAGE WHERE REVIEWIMAGE.STORE_ID=RESULT.STORE_ID ORDER BY VIEWS DESC LIMIT 1, 1) AS STOREIMG2, (SELECT CONCAT('https://team-moca.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/review/',UU_ID,'_',ORIGINNAME) FROM REVIEWIMAGE WHERE REVIEWIMAGE.STORE_ID=RESULT.STORE_ID ORDER BY VIEWS DESC LIMIT 2, 1) AS STOREIMG3 FROM (SELECT STORE.STORE_ID, NAME, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT, CNT, ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(XLOCATION, YLOCATION), POINT(127.0292996, 37.499560699999996)) as DISTANCE FROM (SELECT STORE_ID, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM LOG WHERE CLASSIFICATION='스토어뷰' AND LOGTIME>(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY STORE_ID) LOGTABLE INNER JOIN STORE ON LOGTABLE.STORE_ID=STORE.STORE_ID WHERE REVIEWCNT>=0 AND AVERAGELEVEL>=0
HAVING DISTANCE<=20000
ORDER BY CNT DESC LIMIT 15) RESULT

SELECT STORE.STORE_ID, NAME, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, REVIEWCNT, AVERAGE AS AVERAGELEVEL, (SELECT CONCAT('https://team-moca.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/review/',UU_ID,'_',ORIGINNAME) FROM REVIEWIMAGE WHERE REVIEWIMAGE.STORE_ID=INNERTABLE.STORE_ID ORDER BY VIEWS DESC LIMIT 0, 1) AS STOREIMG1, (SELECT CONCAT('https://team-moca.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/review/',UU_ID,'_',ORIGINNAME) FROM REVIEWIMAGE WHERE REVIEWIMAGE.STORE_ID=INNERTABLE.STORE_ID ORDER BY VIEWS DESC LIMIT 1, 1) AS STOREIMG2, (SELECT CONCAT('https://team-moca.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/review/',UU_ID,'_',ORIGINNAME) FROM REVIEWIMAGE WHERE REVIEWIMAGE.STORE_ID=INNERTABLE.STORE_ID ORDER BY VIEWS DESC LIMIT 2, 1) AS STOREIMG3 FROM (SELECT STORE_ID, AVG(AVERAGELEVEL) AS AVERAGE, COUNT(AVERAGELEVEL) AS CNT FROM REVIEW WHERE WRITEDATE>(NOW()-INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY STORE_ID HAVING AVERAGE>0 AND CNT>0 ORDER BY AVERAGE DESC LIMIT 15) INNERTABLE INNER JOIN STORE ON INNERTABLE.STORE_ID=STORE.STORE_ID;

SELECT STORE_ID, NAME, STOREIMG1, STOREIMG2, STOREIMG3, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT, DISTANCE FROM (SELECT STORE_ID, NAME, STOREIMG1, STOREIMG2, STOREIMG3, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT, ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(XLOCATION, YLOCATION), POINT(#{x}, #{y})) AS DISTANCE FROM STORE WHERE CATEGORY like '%테이크아웃%') INNERTABLE WHERE DISTANCE<5000 ORDER BY DISTANCE

SELECT STORE_ID, NAME, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT, (SELECT CONCAT('https://team-moca.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/review/',UU_ID,'_',ORIGINNAME) FROM REVIEWIMAGE WHERE REVIEWIMAGE.STORE_ID=INNERTABLE.STORE_ID ORDER BY VIEWS DESC LIMIT 0, 1) AS STOREIMG1, (SELECT CONCAT('https://team-moca.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/review/',UU_ID,'_',ORIGINNAME) FROM REVIEWIMAGE WHERE REVIEWIMAGE.STORE_ID=INNERTABLE.STORE_ID ORDER BY VIEWS DESC LIMIT 1, 1) AS STOREIMG2, (SELECT CONCAT('https://team-moca.s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/review/',UU_ID,'_',ORIGINNAME) FROM REVIEWIMAGE WHERE REVIEWIMAGE.STORE_ID=INNERTABLE.STORE_ID ORDER BY VIEWS DESC LIMIT 2, 1) AS STOREIMG3 FROM (SELECT STORE_ID, NAME, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT, ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(XLOCATION, YLOCATION), POINT(#{x}, #{y})) as distance FROM STORE forRN HAVING distance<5000 ORDER BY AVERAGELEVEL DESC LIMIT 15) INNERTABLE

SELECT STORE_ID, NAME, STOREIMG1, STOREIMG2, STOREIMG3, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT FROM (SELECT STORE_ID, NAME, STOREIMG1, STOREIMG2, STOREIMG3, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT,@rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum FROM (SELECT STORE.STORE_ID,cnt, NAME, STOREIMG1, STOREIMG2, STOREIMG3, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT FROM (SELECT store_id, COUNT(${value}) as cnt FROM TAGS GROUP BY store_id HAVING cnt>0)innerTable INNER JOIN STORE ON innerTable.store_id = STORE.STORE_ID, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0)forRN)innerTable2 ORDER BY AVERAGELEVEL DESC )innerTable3 WHERE rownum<16 ORDER BY rownum

SELECT STORE_ID, NAME, STOREIMG1, STOREIMG2, STOREIMG3, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT FROM STORE WHERE STORE_ID IN (SELECT STORE_ID FROM REVIEW WHERE ACCOUNT_ID IN (SELECT FOLLOWING FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER = #{id}) AND AVERAGELEVEL>=4)

, ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(XLOCATION, YLOCATION), POINT(#{x}, #{y})) AS DISTANCE
, ${ratingName} FROM STORE, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) ROWNUMTABLE WHERE ${ratingName}>=3.5

WHERE DISTANCE<=20000
ORDER BY AVERAGELEVEL DESC) INNERTABLE2 WHERE ROWNUM<16

SELECT STORE_ID, NAME, STOREIMG1, STOREIMG2, STOREIMG3, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT FROM (SELECT STORE_ID, NAME, STOREIMG1, STOREIMG2, STOREIMG3, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT, (@ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1) AS ROWNUM FROM (SELECT STORE_ID, NAME, STOREIMG1, STOREIMG2, STOREIMG3, ROADADDRESS, VIEWCNT, AVERAGELEVEL, REVIEWCNT
